data.title: Christiane Amanpour
data.meta_description: Christiane Amanpour. Actress: Zoolander 2. Christiane Amanpour was born on 12 January 1958 in London, England, UK. She is a writer and producer, known for Zoolander 2 (2016), Iron Man 2 (2010) and Trash (2014). She was previously married to James Rubin.
data.text:
Failed her driving test 4 times as a student in England, and passed the test first time after moving to the U.S.A.

Amanpour was permitted to interview the extremist Russian politician, Vladimir Zhirinovsky, for 60 Minutes after he specifically said he would not be interviewed by an American correspondent from the show.

Born in Ealing, London, England, to Patricia Anne (Hill) and Mohammad Taghi Amanpour. Her father was from a wealthy Persian family, and was born in Tehran. Her English mother was born in Paris, France, to English parents. Her parents met when her mother traveled to Iran.

Found out on the Genealogy show Finding Your Roots with Henry Louis Gates Jr that her paternal grandfather's brother was murdered in Iran and when her grandfather found out about it he went to Teheran to exact "blood money" and when he got to Teheran he was given a title given to clerics in order to appease him.

Discovered on Finding Your Roots with Henry Louis Gates, Jr. (2012) that her great-great-great-great-grandfather was Mirza Mohammad Taghi, who was Governor of the Province of Isfahan in the 1840s.

She was awarded the C.B.E. (Commander of the Order of the British Empire) in the 2007 Queen's Birthday Honors List for her services to journalism.

Her son's name is "Darius". "Darius" is a Persian name, which was the name of one of the historical kings of Iran.
